amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow commercial fishermen to be eligible recipients of the Emergency Disaster Loan program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to allow commercial fishermen to be eligible recipients of the Emergency Disaster Loan program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 215 (Roll no. 268).
